name: 吳昭正
objective:
C語言，指標，結構，陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構
，排列，搜尋。
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction
Week 2. Basic Concepts
Week 3. Arrays and Structures (I)
Week 4. Arrays and Structures (II)
Week 5. Stacks and Queues (I)
Week 6. Stacks and Queues (II)
Week 7. Linked Lists (I)
Week 8. Linked Lists (II)
week 9. Midterm
Week 10. Trees (I)
Week 11. Trees (II)
Week 12. Graphs (I)
Week 13. Graphs (II)
Week 14. Sorting
Week 15. Hashing
Week 16. AVL trees
Week 17. Multiway Search Trees
week 18. Final
materials: Fundamentals of Data Structures in C, 2nd Edition, by Horowitz, Sahni, and Anderson-Freed, Silicon Press
